name: Hasan Ural
content: Dr. Hasan Ural Hasan Ural Ph. D. Professor Emeritus Research Interests: Software Testing and Verification Formal Methods for Software Specification and Design Distributed Computing Recent Publications Validation Tools Courses Dr. Hasan Ural School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS), University of Ottawa 800 King Edward Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: (613) 562-5888, Fax: (613) 562-5664 Office: SITE, Room 4009D Email: ural@uottawa.ca Contactez: L'École science informatique et de génie électrique / Contact: School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Copyright © 2001 Université d'Ottawa / University of Ottawa Webmestre / Webmaster
